籤詩版本二:
Mutsetse wegoridhe unoyera moyo wako, hapana kuderera, hapana kuwedzera, hapana uremu
Ane mwoyo wakarurama muupenyu hwake hwose, uye zvinyorwa zvake zvose zvinopenya uye unyanzvi hwake hunopenya.Bei anotaura nezveBeizi sepfuma. Bei ine midziyo.
詩意:
Iyi hexagram inomiririra moyo wakadzikama uye wakarurama.
Zvose zvakagadzikana uye hazvina ngozi.
解曰: Rugare rwepfungwa uye kuperera. Pakupedzisira, rugare nerunyararo. Ingotevera basa rako. Nyika ine rugare.
籤詩故事一:
◇Jinjing anoedza Douer
Dou Yanshan akaita mabasa akanaka uye akaunganidza hunhu, uye akazvara vanakomana vashanu, vese vakawana budiriro. Mwari aida kuedza mumwe wevanakomana vake, Dou Yi, uye vakatumira mweya wegoridhe wakanyengerwa semusikana kuti unyengedze Dou Yi, asi Dou Yi haana kuzununguswa.Gare gare, Dou Yi akaona musikana uyu achishanduka kuita chiedza chendarama ndokuenda pasi pevhu, ndokuchera denga racho. ndokuwana ingo yegoridhe.
(Iyi nyaya dimikira remanzwiro aDou Yi, kwete ekuyedzwa kwepabonde.)
聖意: Vemhuri → Kuzvichengetera wega → Tsvaka pfuma → Iva akangwara mukutengeserana → Wanano yakatsiga → Batanidza Liujia → Vanofamba netsoka varume → Iva nemakonye eXintian → Zvipfuyo zvakatsiga → Wana vanhu murugare → Kunonoka kumatare eruzhinji → Kutama zvine rugare → Chengetedza zvinhu zvakarasika Jing xi xingshan guva → flat
